humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one out of two right axillary lymph nodes is positive for micrometastatic (1 mm) carcinoma, present only on frozen section (AJCC pN1mi). This indicates that the patient's N stage is N1, as per the new rule 12.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has one out of 2 sentinel lymph nodes positive for micrometastatic (1 mm) carcinoma, present only on frozen section (AJCC pN1mi). This indicates a pathologic N stage of N1.
